short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Mango Two to generate shortened URLS for sharing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mango Two is a privacy-first, open source URL shortener. You can use it for generating short URLs for sharing with your family, friends and colleagues without worrying about invasive tracking.
